item.title: Format War Footnotes
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: They say that history is written by the people who winâ€”a standard that translates to wars and land grabs of all types. But it also translates pretty effectively to format wars. Generally, when we reminisce about old-school formats, we tend to focus on vinyl records, tape decks, and floppy disks, but those only really scratch the surface of the kind of bizarre formats out there to grab content from.
